statements: DELETE FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 100 AND first_name = 'Alice';
DELETE FROM user_data WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'M';
DELETE FROM demographics WHERE user_id = 100 AND age > 30

DELETE FROM interests WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM demographics WHERE location = 'New York');
DELETE FROM interests WHERE user_id = 101 AND interest_level > 5
